name: Twisted Candyland
description:
,.-~*´¨¯¨`*·~-.¸-(  Twisted Candyland  )-,.-~*´¨¯¨`*·~-.¸

Late at night, you find yourself lost deep in the woods. 
You spot a light off in the distance. 
As you approach you realize it's coming from a very strange hut.
You are too cold and tired to judge the dweller's bizarre taste.
